word_mean: 劣势的：不能产生主导或控制性影响的
隐性的：在遗传学上，指如果不由一对同源染色体的二个成员携带主要基因则不能表达的

sentence.Network_en: Sickle-cell anaemia is passed on through a recessive gene.
sentence.Network_cn: 镰状细胞贫血通过隐性基因遗传给后代。

sentence.Network_en: Blue eyes are recessive and brown eyes are dominant.
sentence.Network_cn: 蓝眼睛是隐性的;而褐色眼睛是显性的.

sentence.Network_en: F 1 females could be backcrossed to the male homozygous recessive parent.
sentence.Network_cn: 也可用雌性F1与隐性纯合雄性亲本回交.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...和大田种植的作对照，以排除虫媒的干扰。2. 杂种1代（filial generation 1，F1）, 确定了“显性”（dominate）性状和“隐性”(recessive)性状。将在杂交中能传递给后代的性状称为显性，而在传递过程中潜伏的性状称为隐性。, 3. F2代的观察
SAT官方指南OG阅读真题10套 - 豆丁网 ... conditional adj. 有条件的 recessive adj. 隐性的 revolutionary adj. 革命的.
赵丽——GRE词汇课 - 豆丁网 ... niche 凹处  recessive 隐性基因←→  dominant 显性基因.
GRE逆序_馆档网 ... impassive 无动于衷的，冷漠的 recessive 隐性遗传的，后退的 regressive 退步的，退化的.

list.abs: 因为衰退(Recession)后伴随的是沮丧(depression)，更多的人需要看病了。绝大多数人并没有发财，好像一夜梦醒，忽然间目标没了…
中经社词汇索引_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... recall (瑕庇品)回收 recession 经济衰退 reclaimed land 海埔新生地.
土建专业英语 - 学贵有恒的日志 - 网易博客 ... 凹进 recess 凹进处 recess 凹面 concave.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent.: from recess, on the pattern of excessive

entry.def: A recessive gene produces a particular characteristic only if a person has two of these genes, one from each parent.

example.ex: Sickle-cell anaemia is passed on through a recessive gene.
example.tran: 镰状细胞贫血通过隐性基因遗传给后代。

means.word_mean: 1. of or pertaining to a recession
2. of genes; producing its characteristic phenotype only when its allele is identical
